channel.title: Edit Static String

item.title: Edit Static String
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I am trying to cut part a STATIC string value and create another string which has the useful information.
E.g

String CurrentURL = http://www.IdontNeedThis.com/ImportantInformation;
String ServerIP = ImportantInformation;

How can I make “ServerIP” cut the website bit and only show the end?

Read full topic
